participants.name: Lisa Potter
participants.description: Click here to visit my page at Phoenix Real Estate Guides

messages.message:
Brian
Thank you for connecting!
I dream of Necker island too.
Really? And I love Richard Branson.

Brian
Really really.  We watched a documentary about him.
We've been thinking a lot about real-estate lately.  It should be a good conversation tomorrow.
Yes. I'm looking forward to meeting u two and seeing ur place.

Brian
Q: What has four wheels and flies?
A: A garbage truck!
